class.description: Provides data for the OnToBeUnzipped event.

property.name: CompressedSize
property.descrip: The compressed size of the file to be unzipped.

property.name: Exclude
property.descrip: Set to _TRUE_ to exclude this file from being unzipped.

property.name: FileName
property.descrip: The name of the file to be unzipped.

property.name: FileSize
property.descrip: The size of the file to be unzipped.

property.name: IsDirectory
property.descrip: If _TRUE_, the file is actually a directory entry.
